primevc.gui.managers.IPopupManager

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable

Instance Methods

add(popup : primevc.gui.core.IUIComponent, ?modal : Bool) : Int

Method will add the given IUIElement as popup to the displayList. Method will return the depth of the popup or -1 if the popup couldnt be added,

remove(popup : primevc.gui.core.IUIComponent) : Void

Method will remove the IUIElement as popup.
